resources.string: This is the Emergency Communication System application. Its purpose is to provide users with critical alerts, reliable communication channels, and quick access to emergency services. This application is designed for educational purposes and should not be relied upon for real emergencies.
Construido por Estudiantes, para la Comunidad

Este es un marcador de posición para la política de privacidad. Debe reemplazar esto con su propia política de privacidad.
